Scheduling AppointmentsÂ¶

Appointments are created according to the visit definition by default in the save() method in models based on BaseRegisteredSubjectModel in module bhp_registration.

For example:

AppointmentHelper().create_all(self.registered_subject, self.__class__.__name__.lower())
